mapper.update: update meituan_goods_info set temp1='已下架' where gid=#{gid}
mapper.select: select gi.gid,gi.sid,gi.gtitle1,gi.gtitle2,gi.gprice1,gi.privilege,gi.gprice2,gi.img,gi.text,gin.b_retime,gin.b_usetime, gin.b_ordertip,gin.b_parlor,gin.b_pack,gin.b_serve,gin.b_limittip,gin.b_prompt from meituan_goods_info gi inner join meituan_goods_intro gin on gi.gid=gin.gid where gi.gid=#{gid}
mapper.update:
update meituan_goods_info
gtitle1=#{gtitle1},
gtitle2=#{gtitle2},
gprice1=#{gprice1},
privilege=#{privilege},
img=#{img},
text=#{text}
where gid=#{gid}

update meituan_goods_intro
b_retime=#{b_retime},
b_usetime=#{b_usetime},
b_ordertip=#{b_ordertip},
b_parlor=#{b_parlor},
b_pack=#{b_pack},
b_serve=#{b_serve},
b_limittip=#{b_limittip}
where gid=#{gid}
mapper.select: select o.oid, o.oidentifier, o.otime, o.opaytime, o.opwd, o.ocount, u.uaccounts, g.gtitle1, o.oprice from meituan_uorder o inner join meituan_user_info u on u.muid = o.muid inner join meituan_goods_info g on o.gid = g.gid where opwd = #{opwd} and o.ostatus = '未使用'
mapper.update: update meituan_uorder set ostatus = '已使用', usetime = sysdate where opwd = #{opwd}
mapper.select: select gtitle1,gsoldcount from meituan_goods_info where sid=#{sid}

select gi.gid,gi.gtitle1,sum(o.ocount) totalTodaySold from meituan_goods_info gi left join meituan_uorder o on gi.gid=o.gid left join meituan_seller_info ms on ms.sid=gi.sid where ms.sid=#{sid} and trunc(o.otime)=trunc(sysdate) group by gi.gid,gi.gtitle1
